name: Select Row
description: Label and description on the left, Select dropdown on the right. Mirrors the toggle-setting-row pattern for enum choices in settings panels.
notes: items-center (not items-start) here because Select is a single-line control that should align with the label's baseline, not float to the top.

variations.name: Inline
variations.description: No description text. Tighter single-line layout for compact setting groups.

variations.name: With Icon
variations.description: Leading icon before the label for visual scanning in longer settings lists.
